DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : l. To test hypothesis killer immunoglobulin-like receptor ( KIR ) human leukocyte antigen ( HLA ) genotypes predict overall response ( partial response [ PR ] , complete response [ CR ] , unconfirmed complete response [ CRu ] ) within 12 month rituximab-containing monoclonal antibody combination follicular lymphoma patient treat CALGB protocols 50402 50701 . SECONDARY OBJECTIVES : I . To test hypothesis KIR HLA genotype associate survival outcome ( progression-free survival [ PFS ] overall survival [ OS ] ) follicular lymphoma patient treat rituximab-containing monoclonal antibody combination CALGB protocols 50402 50701 . OUTLINE : Genomic DNA extract previously collect blood sample KIR HLA genotyping polymorphism analysis .
DOC.criteria: Untreated follicular lymphoma Has receive rituximabcontaining monoclonal antibody therapy CALGB50402 CALGB50701 Patients previously provide informed consent allow correlative study genomic DNA
